en: Peppa and George are having their favorite food --- spaghetti!
zh: 佩奇和乔治在吃他们最喜欢的食物--意大利面！

en: Ah, now we'll have a bit of quiet!
Peppa, maybe you should look in the mirror!
zh: 佩奇，也许你应该去镜子里看看！

en: It's my tooth! It's fallen out!
zh: 这是我的牙齿！它掉下来了！

en: Will I grow a new one, Mummy?
zh: 妈妈，我还会长出新牙吗？

en: It also means the Tooth Fairy will be paying you a visit.
zh: 它也意味着牙仙子会来看你的。

en: If you put the tooth under your pillow tonight,
zh: 如果今晚你将牙齿放在你的枕头下，

en: The Tooth Fairy will take the tooth.
And in its place, she will leave a shiny coin!
zh: 在原来的地方，她会放下一枚闪亮的金币！

en: When I grow up,I want to be a Tooth Fairy!
zh: 等我长大了，我也要成为牙仙子！

en: And what would you like to be when you grow up, George?
zh: 乔治，那你长大以后想做什么？
快点，乔治，是时候上床睡觉了！

en: We don't want to miss the Tooth Fairy!
zh: 我们可不想错过牙仙子！

en: Before going to bed, Peppa and George brush their teeth.
zh: 上床之前，佩奇和乔治在刷牙。

en: I'm brushing my tooth so it is nice and clean for the Tooth Fairy.
zh: 我在刷我的牙齿，牙仙子就可以拿到好看又干净的牙齿了。

en: Peppa cannot wait to get into bed.
zh: 佩奇迫不及待的想上床睡觉。

en: Peppa is putting her tooth under the pillow for the Tooth Fairy.
zh: 佩奇将她的牙齿放在枕头下给牙仙子。

en: George, I'm not going to sleep!
Let's both stay awake all night and see the Tooth Fairy!
zh: 我们一晚都不睡，看看牙仙子！

en: This Tooth Fairy is very late!
zh: 这个牙仙子来得太晚了！

en: The Tooth Fairy is taking a long time to arrive.
zh: 牙仙子要很久很久才来。
乔治，你听到了什么了吗？

en: He was so tired, he has fallen asleep.
George is not very good at staying awake, but I am.
zh: 乔治不能一晚上不睡觉，但我可以。

en: I am going to stay awake and see the Tooth Fairy.
Would you like this coin in return for your tooth?
zh: 你想用你的牙齿来换这枚金币吗？
真是一颗好看又干净的牙齿。

en: Let's take a look under your pillow.
zh: 让我们看看你的枕头下。

en: Look, Peppa! The Tooth Fairy has been and she's left you a coin!
zh: 看，佩奇！牙仙子已经来过了，还留了一枚金币！

en: Well, maybe I fell asleep just for a Little bit...
zh: 好吧，也许我只是小睡了一会。。。

en: Next time, I will stay awake, and I will see the Tooth Fairy!
zh: 下次，我会一直醒着而且我会看到牙仙子的！
